video.title: Porque el amor manda
video.synopsis: Jesús García, who works as a pizza delivery driver in Chicago, gets an opportunity to return to Mexico for an important new job and a chance at love.

episodes.synopsis: Carlos shows Jesús the photo of a girl, the daughter of his ex-girlfriend from Monterrey. The briefcase they make him take attracts police interest.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Jesús finds out he’s been hired as a secretary and he’s furious, but he takes the job. Jéssica and Maricela convince Xóchitl that Jesús is gay.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Jesús is offended when he finds out he’s been hired as a secretary. Verónica wants to make Jesús’s fatherhood rights and obligations official.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Jesús returns to Avon to apologize for the scandal and accepts the secretary position. Now Fernando has Jesús right where he wants him.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Jéssica and Maricela convince Xóchitl that Jesús is gay. Fernando asks Rogelio to fire Jesús. Jesús is on thin ice.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Jesús goes to see Valentina and surprises her with a gift. Jesús goes to the gym to look for Alma, and she has a surprise for him.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Fernando mocks Jesús in his secretary uniform. Jesús confronts Cárdenas, but the pants won’t be ready for another day. Alma asks Jesús if he’s gay.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Verónica insists on seeing Jesús’s apartment, but Chatita saves him by letting him use her apartment. Jesús is happy to spend a day with Valentina.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Rogelio hides a drunk Patricia in his kitchen cupboards so Alma won’t see her. They get in a fight. Alma needs time to be alone and think.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Susana organizes the meeting Rogelio called for. Rogelio asks Susana to go buy an engagement ring for Alma. Jesús goes with her.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Susana and Jesús give Rogelio the ring they bought, but he’s upset because it’s not the ring he asked for. Rogelio asks Alma to marry him.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Alma arrives at Avon to meet with a publicist, who turns out to be Elías Franco. Alma decides to help Jesús and pretends to be the secretary.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Rogelio asks Jesús to go pick up his beloved dog Sansón at the airport. The secretaries apologize to Jesús and they patch things up.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Jesús arrives at the airport to pick up the dog, but things don’t go as planned. Fernando has a plan to get revenge on his brother.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: Jéssica and Fernando negotiate how they’ll split up Rogelio’s payout. They’re determined to get Jesús fired so Jéssica can have her job back.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: Hoping to expose Fernando, Alma and Jesús kiss for the first time. The next day, Jesús oversleeps, and now Valentina will be late for school.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: Rogelio gets Sansón back thanks to Jesús, ruining Fernando’s plans. Ricardo blackmails Jéssica after hearing her talking with Fernando about Sansón.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: A fire breaks out. Jesús looks everywhere for Alma and has an accident with a fire extinguisher. Patricia lets Alma know she’s interested in Jesús.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: Jesús denies being in love with Alma. While investigating the robbery of his apartment, a police officer asks Jesús if he’s the owner or if he rents.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: Verónica is determined to get Jesús out of her life. Alma asks Jesús if he’s interested in Patricia.
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: Jesús takes Alma to his apartment, and she drunkenly kisses him and tells him how she feels. Rogelio tells Máximo to give Jesús a job at his company.
episodes.title: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: Verónica finds out Jesús is a secretary. Rogelio tells him there’s a job for him at Orión where he can earn more money and spend time with Valentina.
episodes.title: Episode 22

episodes.synopsis: Verónica confronts Elías for not telling her Jesús works as a secretary. Rogelio shows up and makes a scene when he sees Alma with Jesús in church.
episodes.title: Episode 23

episodes.synopsis: Valentina asks her father if she’s going back home. He says she has to work things out like an adult. Valentina says goodbye to her toys.
episodes.title: Episode 24

episodes.synopsis: A taxi driver finds Valentina alone on the street and decides to help her. Elías shows up drunk at Jesús’s house. Malvino and Silverio attack them.
episodes.title: Episode 25

episodes.synopsis: Verónica reproaches Valentina for leaving the house. Delia issues a search warrant, but the store room is empty. Fernando likes Discua as a secretary.
episodes.title: Episode 26

episodes.synopsis: Alma cries about Jesús’s leaving, disconcerted with her feelings. Fernando introduces Discua to everyone at the company. Jéssica is jealous.
episodes.title: Episode 27

episodes.synopsis: Fernando rejects Jéssica because he’s interested in Discua now and she clearly resents it. Maricela denies being attracted to Ricardo.
episodes.title: Episode 28

episodes.synopsis: Valentina is still sad that her mother is sad. Xóchitl gives Jesús a kiss in Remigio’s taxi. She isn’t pleased with his reaction.
episodes.title: Episode 29

episodes.synopsis: Maricela and Ricardo go to dinner at La Fontaine. Jesús introduces Valentina and Xóchitl and goes up to talk to Verónica and cheer her up.
episodes.title: Episode 30

episodes.synopsis: Patricia tells Rogelio that Alma has feelings for Jesús. Verónica is depressed. Jesús tells Elías he should work things out with her.
episodes.title: Episode 31

episodes.synopsis: Jesús advises Elías to work things out with Verónica. Patricia tells Alma that Jesús is just using Xóchitl to get over her, because he loves her.
episodes.title: Episode 32

episodes.synopsis: Verónica admits she still loves Jesús. Fernando tells Rogelio Alma loves Jesús. Rogelio says he has an ace up his sleeve and it’s time to use it.
episodes.title: Episode 33

episodes.synopsis: Fernando manages to recover the money from the trash. Rogelio asks security to give him cameras to spy on Alma and Jesús. Patricia catches him.
episodes.title: Episode 34

episodes.synopsis: Alma and Jesús are still under the table. They decide to take a break and order a pizza. Xóchitl’s mother treats Maricela terribly and turns her away.
episodes.title: Episode 35

episodes.synopsis: Valentina’s mother is still asleep so she talks to Jesús. He takes Elías’s truck to Valentina’s school. Elías calls the police to report a robbery.
episodes.title: Episode 36

episodes.synopsis: Rogelio asks Sebastián to help get Alma away from Jesús, fearing she’ll decide not to marry him. Verónica admits she married Elías to get over Jesús.
episodes.title: Episode 37

episodes.synopsis: Rogelio tells Sebastián he’s afraid Alma has feelings for Jesús and might call off the wedding. Jesús quits his job at Orión.
episodes.title: Episode 38

episodes.synopsis: Verónica finds out Elías is out of a job and offers to let him come back. Alma tells Jesús she’ll be his assistant. He says she’s his guardian angel.
episodes.title: Episode 39

episodes.synopsis: Rogelio tells Alma he found out that that night Jesús and Xóchitl are planning a night of passion. Alma can’t hide her disappointment.
episodes.title: Episode 40

episodes.synopsis: Sebastián questions Alma about her feelings towards Jesús. Alma says she’s planning to stay with Rogelio and marry the man who saved her life.
episodes.title: Episode 41

episodes.synopsis: The neighborhood is up in arms when Ricardo and Verónica confront Elías for being with Maricela. Chatita warns Jesús not to encourage Xóchitl.
episodes.title: Episode 42

episodes.synopsis: Patricia tells the psychologist she’s in love with Rogelio and she’s not sorry for betraying her best friend for true love.
episodes.title: Episode 43

episodes.synopsis: Jesús tells Alma he’s not going to the wedding, using lack of funds as an excuse. Valentina is still very sad. She’s not sure she wants them together.
episodes.title: Episode 44

episodes.synopsis: Rogelio sets up the raffle so Xóchitl will win the trip for two to the beach. Xóchitl is excited and says she’s going to take Jesús.
episodes.title: Episode 45

episodes.synopsis: Jéssica, dressed as a firefighter, seduces Rogelio. He proposes giving her her job as administrative secretary back. Fernando records the whole thing.
episodes.title: Episode 46

episodes.synopsis: Elías finds out Jesús spent the night at his house. Valentina interrupts them about to fight. Jesús promises Pánfilo he’ll talk with Maricela.
episodes.title: Episode 47

episodes.synopsis: Jesús receives a photo of himself with Alma captioned: “Could it be love?” Julio gives Rogelio dance lessons, and rumors start spreading.
episodes.title: Episode 48

episodes.synopsis: Rogelio and Patricia take a trip to the ranch. Jesús calls because he needs her to sign some documents. Rogelio answers and comes up with a lie.
episodes.title: Episode 49

episodes.synopsis: Fernando is submerged in the river for his purification ritual, but it doesn’t go well. Patricia puts sleeping pills in Rogelio’s drink.
episodes.title: Episode 50

episodes.synopsis: Discua rescues Fernando from drowning during the baptism. Alma asks Jesús to join her for the pre-nuptial enquiry, but the priest thinks he’s Rogelio.
episodes.title: Episode 51

episodes.synopsis: Fernando comes back to the office a new man, kind and friendly with all the secretaries, and he even promises the employees a raise.
episodes.title: Episode 52

episodes.synopsis: Verónica, testing Alma, asks her to help her get Jesús back. Fernando visits Rogelio at the hospital and says he wants to come clean and start over.
episodes.title: Episode 53

episodes.synopsis: Chatita advises Elías to divorce Verónica before starting a relationship with Maricela. Jesús hires Iñaki to strip for the bachelorette party.
episodes.title: Episode 54

episodes.synopsis: Discua comes to Fernando’s apartment and catches him with Jéssica. Patricia installs a camera at Alma’s house to record the stripper.
episodes.title: Episode 55

episodes.synopsis: Elías spends all night preparing the Avon campaign. Rogelio apologizes to Fernando and asks him to take care of the office in his absence. He agrees.
episodes.title: Episode 56

episodes.synopsis: Jesús and Elías face off. Jesús tells him not to fight with Verónica in front of the girl. Sebastián takes Susana flowers and gets some bad news.
episodes.title: Episode 57

episodes.synopsis: Alma asks Rogelio to push back the wedding due to her father’s health condition. Jesús agrees to talk with the guests and take care of it.
episodes.title: Episode 58

episodes.synopsis: Fernando insists on seeing Discua, but the brothers in his congregation won’t allow it. Martha doesn’t want Jesús to blame himself for the divorce.
episodes.title: Episode 59

episodes.synopsis: Rogelio dreams he’s in jail and Fernando visits him to tell him he’s married Discua. Fernando cries for losing her and vows vengeance on his brother.
episodes.title: Episode 60

episodes.synopsis: Jesús finds Fernando about to throw himself off a building, feeling his life is meaningless. Rogelio hires Alejandra to seduce Fernando.
episodes.title: Episode 61

episodes.synopsis: Patricia steals perfume at a mall. Jéssica confesses to Cárdenas that she loves Fernando.
episodes.title: Episode 62

episodes.synopsis: Rogelio gathers the employees to figure out who’s behind the photo of Alma and Jesús, planning to severely punish the culprit. Verónica misses Jesús.
episodes.title: Episode 63

episodes.synopsis: Valentina tells her father Elías that Jesús and Verónica kissed. Furious, Elías threatens not to sign the divorce papers. New Year’s Eve approaches.
episodes.title: Episode 64

episodes.synopsis: Maricela tells Martha she’s going out with Elías. Jesús tells Delia that Fernando tried to kill himself. Alma assures Patricia she loves Rogelio.
episodes.title: Episode 65

episodes.synopsis: Elías is furious with Verónica and says he’ll destroy her in the divorce. Alma confesses she’s not sure how she feels about Rogelio and Jesús.
episodes.title: Episode 66

episodes.synopsis: Rogelio finds the photographer who caught him with Patricia. Jesús offers to help Alma square the accounts so she can deliver them to the Avon execs.
episodes.title: Episode 67

episodes.synopsis: Martha sends Maricela the photos of Elías kissing her and sleeping over. Alma goes to Acapulco to surprise Rogelio, but she’s the one who’s surprised.
episodes.title: Episode 68

episodes.synopsis: Maricela tells Pánfilo she’s in love with Elías. Jesús takes Valentina to Avon. Xóchitl finds out she was conceived through artificial insemination.
episodes.title: Episode 69

episodes.synopsis: Rogelio shows Fernando the article he sent to be published that claims Discua was arrested for defrauding men with her religious con.
episodes.title: Episode 70

episodes.synopsis: Jesús suggests Xóchitl look for her father’s info online. In Acapulco, Fernando confesses to his brother he tried to kill himself and Jesús saved him.
episodes.title: Episode 71

episodes.synopsis: Xóchitl asks Jesús to go get Alma’s dress in Acapulco or there’ll be no wedding. Jesús asks for a chance to save the marriage of the woman he loves.
episodes.title: Episode 72

episodes.synopsis: Alma and Rogelio’s wedding day arrives, but the police show up. Alma is in shock, and wants to turn to Jesús for comfort, but Sebastián won’t let her.
episodes.title: Episode 73

episodes.synopsis: Fernando is sorry for reporting Rogelio and admits his accusations were fabricated. Alejandra confesses that Rogelio paid her to spend time with him.
episodes.title: Episode 74

episodes.synopsis: Elías kicks Verónica out of the house. She takes her daughter and moves in with Jesús. Rogelio denies all accusations and swears Fernando did it.
episodes.title: Episode 75

episodes.synopsis: Jesús tells Elías that Valentina is lost. Rogelio tells Alma she’s free and asks her to get out of his house.
episodes.title: Episode 76

episodes.synopsis: Jesús asks Alma why Fernando is in jail. Verónica makes Jesús a surprise dinner. Alma is called in for an urgent meeting with the president of Avon.
episodes.title: Episode 77

episodes.synopsis: Alma finds out Avon is holding a contest and asks Jesús to accompany her to see Pancho López. Maricela confronts her father for talking to Elías.
episodes.title: Episode 78

episodes.synopsis: Patricia gives Rogelio the memory card with the photo. The Avon meeting begins and the lawyer brings in a resolution on the Rogelio Rivadeneira case.
episodes.title: Episode 79

episodes.synopsis: Jesús is sure his love for Alma is a lost cause. Jesús wins the gold medal for the most valuable employee and asks Alma to talk with him.
episodes.title: Episode 80

episodes.synopsis: Patricia, dressed as a nun, visits Rogelio. He tells her his problems and says he had the Avon regional management taken away from him.
episodes.title: Episode 81

episodes.synopsis: Xóchitl asks Julio for help, her mother is unconscious on the floor. The doctor tells her she didn’t really faint and suggests she see a psychologist.
episodes.title: Episode 82

episodes.synopsis: Alma arrives at Rogelio’s house and confesses it was a mistake to marry him. Hurt, Rogelio wants to be alone. Patricia decides to send Alma the video.
episodes.title: Episode 83

episodes.synopsis: Martha hears Maricela call Pánfilo dad, and she hears Elías is granting Verónica a divorce. Martha starts seeing Valentina as her own daughter.
episodes.title: Episode 84

episodes.synopsis: Verónica tells Jesús what happened with Martha and asks him to go see them. Alma receives a video from Patricia of Jéssica and Rogelio kissing.
episodes.title: Episode 85

episodes.synopsis: Fernando is captivated by Natasha and absolutely must meet her. Elías understands that Jesús loves Alma and he isn’t interested in Verónica.
episodes.title: Episode 86

episodes.synopsis: Rogelio is furious when Cantú can’t get him out of house arrest. Jesús confronts Patricia and tells her he knows she’s having an affair with Rogelio.
episodes.title: Episode 87

episodes.synopsis: Verónica confronts Jesús for being in love with Alma while she’s married. Jesús confesses that deep down he never forgave her for hiding Valentina.
episodes.title: Episode 88

episodes.synopsis: Alma is furious with Patricia for what she did with Rogelio. Elías and Jesús are still concerned about Valentina’s wellbeing because of Martha.
episodes.title: Episode 89

episodes.synopsis: Jesús decides to follow Alma to Cancún. Xóchitl prepares for another night as Natasha. Julio sees her and can’t help but give her a kiss.
episodes.title: Episode 90

episodes.synopsis: Chatita finds out Pánfilo is losing his sight because of his diabetes. Alma talks to Jesús, furious he didn’t tell her about Patricia and Rogelio.
episodes.title: Episode 91

episodes.synopsis: Alma and Jesús share a romantic moment in Cancún. Rogelio proposes Verónica go to the Riviera Maya. Jéssica asks Xóchitl for relationship advice.
episodes.title: Episode 92

episodes.synopsis: Alma and Jesús are still enjoying the Riviera Maya. They’re happy to be together. Chatita remembers Ray’s secret.
episodes.title: Episode 93

episodes.synopsis: Fernando recognizes Xóchitl’s perfume, it’s the same one Natasha wears, but he doesn’t make the connection. Jesús takes Valentina to see Chatita.
episodes.title: Episode 94

episodes.synopsis: Jesús reports Valentina’s kidnapping. Jéssica is mad at Xóchitl for falling in love with Fernando and threatens to tell the lawyer the truth.
episodes.title: Episode 95

episodes.synopsis: Fernando can’t believe Xóchitl would do this to him. Ury plans his revenge against Jesús. Ricardo takes Maricela to his house and kisses her.
episodes.title: Episode 96

episodes.synopsis: Valentina finds Martha’s cell phone while she’s asleep. Jesús rescues Valentina. Julio is upset because he doesn’t know what’s going on with Xóchitl.
episodes.title: Episode 97

episodes.synopsis: Augusto offers Jesús a job as vice president at Orión. Alma confesses to Rogelio that she almost called off the wedding.
episodes.title: Episode 98

episodes.synopsis: Ricardo asks Elías if he’s interested in Maricela and they agree to fight for her. Jesús tells Alma he has a job offer, but he wants to stay with her.
episodes.title: Episode 99

episodes.synopsis: Alma tells Xóchitl she’s thought of her for Gilberto’s job. Fernando is in conflict with Rogelio because Jesús has become a good friend of his.
episodes.title: Episode 100

episodes.synopsis: Fernando tells Alejandra that Rogelio has a plan to take Jesús down. Patricia begs Alma to forgive her.
episodes.title: Episode 101

episodes.synopsis: Jesús recognizes Malvino and Calavera as the men who beat him. Fernando defends Xóchitl from Rogelio. Patricia goes to Alma’s house to apologize.
episodes.title: Episode 102

episodes.synopsis: Ury demands Jesús stay away from Alma and Valentina. Maricela takes care of the plant Ricardo gave her and admits she loves both Elías and Ricardo.
episodes.title: Episode 103

episodes.synopsis: Jesús says hello to his old secretary Aída, and she’s very happy to see him. Jesús tells Alma all he cares about is taking care of his daughter.
episodes.title: Episode 104

episodes.synopsis: Jesús assures Alma that the most important thing is making sure his daughter is well provided for. Ury goes to see Chatita.
episodes.title: Episode 105

episodes.synopsis: Verónica threatens Jesús saying she won’t let him see Valentina. Xóchitl tells the other secretaries that Fernando invited her to his apartment.
episodes.title: Episode 106

episodes.synopsis: Alma knows Jesús is being threatened by Ury. Xóchitl finds Alejandra at Fernando’s house and she gets jealous. The house is decorated just for her.
episodes.title: Episode 107

episodes.synopsis: Augusto offers Jesús a job as vice president at Orión. Alma confesses to Rogelio that she almost called off the wedding.
episodes.title: Episode 108

episodes.synopsis: Verónica and Rogelio are united by their hatred for Jesús García. Patricia says she’s lost without Rogelio, but Alma says to think about her future.
episodes.title: Episode 109

episodes.synopsis: Jesús has to cancel his plans with Alma to go to the Monclova plant to talk with the union leader. Maricela tells Ricardo she’s Pánfilo’s daughter.
episodes.title: Episode 110

episodes.synopsis: Alma, tired of Rogelio’s abuse, quits her job. Alma wants to see Jesús and tell her she quit. Augusto meets Chatita and treats her harshly.
episodes.title: Episode 111

episodes.synopsis: Ray confesses the real reason she dresses as a boy. Jesús and Elías convince her to try on a dress and take her to Valentina.
episodes.title: Episode 112

episodes.synopsis: Jesús promises to help make sure Chatita doesn’t get kicked out of her home. Cárdenas asks Jéssica to marry him.
episodes.title: Episode 113

episodes.synopsis: Jesús receives a court summons and he knows Verónica is behind it. Cantú tells Rogelio he’s the owner of Chatita’s apartment.
episodes.title: Episode 114

episodes.synopsis: Jesús answers his court summons with a knee injury and terrible stomach problems. Astudillo goes with him and finds out Verónica lied.
episodes.title: Episode 115

episodes.synopsis: Alma asks Jesús to be her date at an important dinner. Jesús is under pressure at work, but he agrees. Augusto confesses to Jesús that he’s his son.
episodes.title: Episode 116

episodes.synopsis: Feeling bad about the things she stole, Patricia tells Alma she’s determined to find a job. Verónica tells Valentina she’s going to live with Rogelio.
episodes.title: Episode 117

episodes.synopsis: Xóchitl tells Fernando she has to think about whether she wants to move in with him. Elías knows Verónica and Rogelio have teamed up against Jesús.
episodes.title: Episode 118

episodes.synopsis: Jesús takes Martha to the hospital because her mental faculties are impaired. Verónica and Rogelio won’t let Elías see Valentina.
episodes.title: Episode 119

episodes.synopsis: Saturnino shows up at Chatita’s house with an eviction notice and the police. Jesús has two hours to get the money together.
episodes.title: Episode 120

episodes.synopsis: At the company the contest has everyone under pressure. Rogelio doesn’t trust Alma, because as Jesús’s girlfriend, she could leak info to Orión.
episodes.title: Episode 121

episodes.synopsis: Elías and Verónica argue, and she reminds her that Valentina isn’t her real daughter. Jesús visits Martha and she asks him for help again.
episodes.title: Episode 122

episodes.synopsis: Jesús apologizes to Alma and they make up. Patricia is ready for her first kiss with Elías, and she’s very excited.
episodes.title: Episode 123

episodes.synopsis: Delia arrests Martha, but it looks like she’ll be exempt from prison due to insanity and will instead end up in a psychiatric hospital.
episodes.title: Episode 124

episodes.synopsis: The contest begins and both teams answer the questions correctly. The members agree that Orión has to be punished for Jesús’s being late.
episodes.title: Episode 125

episodes.synopsis: Jesús cooks a delicious meal and decorates his apartment with origami. Patricia, Elías and Valentina go to a theme park and have a good time.
episodes.title: Episode 126

episodes.synopsis: Xóchitl asks Jesús to be the one to give her away at the altar. The DNA test results to determine if Jesús is Valentina’s biological father are back.
episodes.title: Episode 127

episodes.synopsis: Rogelio removes Discua from the church by force. Fernando tells Jesús that Discua is a con artist. Verónica is furious that Rogelio called Patricia.
episodes.title: Episode 128

episodes.synopsis: Augusta pressures Jesús to meet Orión’s goals. Patricia receives a necklace from Rogelio. Rogelio steals Valentina’s doll and decapitates it.
episodes.title: Episode 129

episodes.synopsis: Rogelio denies having stolen Valentina’s doll and Jesús attacks him. Chatita asks Elías whether he’s ever had a relationship with a normal woman.
episodes.title: Episode 130

episodes.synopsis: At Valentina’s birthday party, the police arrest Jesús. Alma slaps Verónica. She tells her she’s a bad mother and Rogelio will only betray her.
episodes.title: Episode 131

episodes.synopsis: Alma and Chatita are very worried about Jesús’s health as he’s suffering internal bleeding. Xóchitl confronts Fernando and says Jesús was arrested.
episodes.title: Episode 132

episodes.synopsis: Jesús’s operation leads to complications. Discua confuses Fernando with a dying old man and feels sorry for him.
episodes.title: Episode 133

episodes.synopsis: Alma realizes Jesús is planning something. Discua tells Fernando where she got her fortune and that she’s willing to fight for their love.
episodes.title: Episode 134

episodes.synopsis: Jesús tells Chatita he wants to do something special to propose to Alma. At the psychiatric hospital, Martha goes missing from her room.
episodes.title: Episode 135

episodes.synopsis: Verónica visits Nick Donovan and records their conversation so she can get Rogelio under her control. Rogelio and Cantú are surprised to see them.
episodes.title: Episode 136

episodes.synopsis: The trial begins to determine whether Jesús will be given visiting rights to Valentina. Delia testifies Jesús was imprisoned for illegal transactions.
episodes.title: Episode 137

episodes.synopsis: Patricia explains to Alma the rules of the rally and that there are tests she has to pass. Jesús monitors everything through images sent by Patricia.
episodes.title: Episode 138

episodes.synopsis: Chatita asks Alma to go with Dr. Muñiz to confirm the pregnancy. She wants to surprise Jesús. Elías tells Patricia he’s in love with her.
episodes.title: Episode 139

episodes.synopsis: Chatita welcomes everyone into her home to give Valentina the news that she’s going to have a little brother. Jesús is happy to hear the announcement.
episodes.title: Episode 140

episodes.synopsis: Delia tells Jesús that Discua has cancer and asks him to talk to Fernando about it. Rogelio is furious with Elías, but Alma makes him leave.
episodes.title: Episode 141

episodes.synopsis: Discua takes the news of her illness with calm. She goes to her community and leaves Xóchitl in charge. Alma and Jesús’s wedding day arrives.
episodes.title: Episode 142

episodes.synopsis: Verónica says she doesn’t know where Alma is, but Jesús doesn’t believe her, because Rogelio told him everything. Verónica confronts Rogelio.
episodes.title: Episode 143

episodes.synopsis: Alma doesn’t want to give up on her duties, but Jesús tells her to think of her baby and her own health. Patricia wonders if she should go with Elías.
episodes.title: Episode 144

episodes.synopsis: The secretaries are happy for Jesús’s success. Elías goes to New York sad that Patricia doesn’t love him. Rogelio asks Patricia for a second chance.
episodes.title: Episode 145

episodes.synopsis: Martha is so good at pretending to be Marcia that Jesús can’t tell the difference. Marcia is worried Martha will be out of control without her meds.
episodes.title: Episode 146

episodes.synopsis: Chatita says the crazy woman is here. They tell her Marcia is Martha’s twin sister, but she has a bad feeling. Rogelio quits his illicit operations.
episodes.title: Episode 147

episodes.synopsis: The secretaries want to ask Xóchitl about her son, but Tracy’s visit adds to the confusion. Patricia confronts Rogelio over Verónica’s pregnancy.
episodes.title: Episode 148

episodes.synopsis: Alma realizes Tracy is an older woman and she thinks it’s sweet that Jesús caught her eye. Alma invites Tracy to dinner at her house.
episodes.title: Episode 149

episodes.synopsis: Jéssica and Cárdena’s wedding is on. At the party room, Cárdenas introduces his nephew, Quico, who plays a waltz for the bride and groom.
episodes.title: Episode 150

episodes.synopsis: Jesús tells everyone in the company to make sure Tracy doesn’t see Rogelio. Valentina has Verónica at her wit’s end and at the point of violence.
episodes.title: Episode 151

episodes.synopsis: Xóchitl takes Jesús’s place to give Rogelio the answers for Tracy. Rogelio is happy and asks to be informed of how Chatita is doing.
episodes.title: Episode 152

episodes.synopsis: Chatita dreams that Martha threw her down the stairs, but Jesús tells her she’s in a psychiatric hospital. Verónica takes some pills.
episodes.title: Episode 153

episodes.synopsis: Rogelio tells Verónica she can stay at his place as long as she wants. Jesús is happy because Chatita is starting to recover her memory.
episodes.title: Episode 154

episodes.synopsis: Alma and Jesús are very excited for the birth of their daughter. They decide to call her Luisa. Everyone in the company celebrates the big news.
episodes.title: Episode 155

episodes.synopsis: Verónica claims before the judge that she never hit Valentina, but Rogelio testifies that she hit her and locked her up. The judge gives her verdict.
episodes.title: Episode 156

episodes.synopsis: Patricia tells Verónica she’s going to marry Rogelio. She’s planning something against Zorrilla. She hires Satán to kill Patricia and steal the ring.
episodes.title: Episode 157

episodes.synopsis: Ricardo wins at poker and starts getting addicted. Julio and Aída are about to make love. Rogelio is in shock when he finds Patricia unconscious.
episodes.title: Episode 158

episodes.synopsis: Jesús and Valentina bathe Luisita for the first time while Alma takes photos. Rogelio decides to call his son Fernando.
episodes.title: Episode 159

episodes.synopsis: Jéssica asks Bernabé to let her be happy with Cárdenas. Jesús gives Valentina a keyboard and Quico gives her a lesson. Verónica refuses to breastfeed.
episodes.title: Episode 160

episodes.synopsis: Martha escapes. Verónica is upset to find out Valentina has a boyfriend. Alma can’t feed her baby after the fight with Verónica.
episodes.title: Episode 161

episodes.synopsis: Suárez arrests Alma for Marcia’s murder, still unaware it was really Martha. Jesús asks Dr. Isaías to compare Marcia and Martha’s fingerprints.
episodes.title: Episode 162

episodes.synopsis: Alma is placed in a cell with a woman known as Tecolota. Satán tells Verónica that Alma is in jail.
episodes.title: Episode 163

episodes.synopsis: Alma reads Jesús’s letter and writes him a reply. Alma remembers having sensed a strange smell in her truck after buying Luisa’s formula.
episodes.title: Episode 164

episodes.synopsis: Jesús explains his theory to Delia. Patricia is growing more and more fond of Fernandito. Rogelio wants to get married to her as soon as possible.
episodes.title: Episode 165

episodes.synopsis: Tecolota tells Alma she has to go to the infirmary and she has a plan to make it happen. Maricela insists to Ricardo that she loves him.
episodes.title: Episode 166

episodes.synopsis: Verónica warns Rogelio she can send him to jail. He’s so mad he could kill her. Jesús reminds Maricela that love conquers all.
episodes.title: Episode 167

episodes.synopsis: Delia is happy she has the proof she needs to take Rogelio down, the evidence Verónica sent her. Alma comes home and hugs Luisita and Valentina.
episodes.title: Episode 168

episodes.synopsis: Rogelio receives threats from Darwin and shares a cell with Monster. Pánfilo plans to ask Chatita to marry him. Sebastián wants to propose to Susana.
episodes.title: Episode 169

episodes.synopsis: Diego Armando, an Argentine recommended by Pancho López, will be in charge of the rebranding campaign. Rogelio can’t feel his legs.
episodes.title: Episode 170

episodes.synopsis: Jesús wants to beat Diego Armando for overstepping his bounds with Alma. Patricia and Rogelio register Fernandito before Verónica can take action.
episodes.title: Episode 171

episodes.synopsis: Everyone laughs at Diego Armando: in the middle of the secretaries’ fashion show, he comes out with his pants down. Chatita gives Patricia advice.
episodes.title: Episode 172

episodes.synopsis: Verónica finds out Patricia gave her Xóchitl’s robot baby. Jesús tells Patricia she shouldn’t have provoked Verónica.
episodes.title: Episode 173

episodes.synopsis: Jesús and Cantú receive the transfer order for Rogelio and they have to run to the jail to tell the warden. Jesús can’t let Ury reunite with Rogelio.
episodes.title: Episode 174

episodes.synopsis: Fernando asks Xóchitl to accompany him to see his father at the retirement home. Maricela prepares a romantic dinner for Ricardo and they make love.
episodes.title: Episode 175

episodes.synopsis: Fernando asks Xóchitl to accompany him to see his father at the retirement home. Maricela prepares a romantic dinner for Ricardo and they make love.
episodes.title: Episode 176

episodes.synopsis: Patricia asks Delia to get a leave for Rogelio to attend Alma and Jesús’s wedding, but the officer says that’s a tall order.
episodes.title: Episode 177

episodes.synopsis: Jesús and Ricardo keep Maricela’s anger in check and ask her to hire the Matute group for the wedding. Xóchitl and Fernando prepare the invitations.
episodes.title: Episode 178

episodes.synopsis: Everyone gathers around to watch Patricia and Verónica fight. Aída and Julio finally consummate their relationship. The bachelor parties are underway.
episodes.title: Episode 179

episodes.synopsis: Jesús tells Alma the police didn’t arrest Verónica and they agree to meet at the Attorney General’s office. They know Verónica killed Cynthia.
episodes.title: Episode 180

episodes.synopsis: Jesús tells Alma the police didn’t arrest Verónica and they agree to meet at the Attorney General’s office. They know Verónica killed Cynthia.
episodes.title: Episode 181

episodes.synopsis: Verónica apologizes to everyone at the church before the police take her away. Jesús and Alma celebrate their love together with their friends.
episodes.title: Episode 182
